title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Rush JIPs Trump's Allentown rally. Trump at 52% approval in Rasmussen, in line with reelection. Trump teasing blowout GDP number. Trump supporters turn out for Biden rally, Biden calls them chumps. Obama campaigns, lies for Biden in North Miami. Kamala Harris, in Cleveland, asks "Are we in Cleveland?" ACB to be confirmed on Hillary's birthday. Biden excited to raise your taxes. Trump characterizes his voters perfectly: People who love the country. Polls show Trump up in many swing states. Rush rejoins the end of the Trump rally. Trump has had no positive news for 4 years and he still may be on the precipice of a resounding reelection. If the mainstream polls start tightening in the next few days, we'll know they've been lying all along and are afraid Trump will win. Huge California car rallies for Trump. NH Trump rally attendee says pollsters aren't finding Trump supporters.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

Nobody shows up for Biden, surrogate rallies. Bon Jovi played a Biden concert for no one. The left’s let Joe be Joe experiment is over, lid put back on Biden. Biden calls Trump “George”. Biden calls Trump supporters “chumps”, just like Hillary called us “deplorables” and Obama called us “bitter clingers”. Obama lied and lied at Biden event in North Miami. Why Trump supporters stay silent, avoid pollsters. Pollsters have made no effort to find out who Trump supporters really are. Luntz: If pollsters get it wrong, industry may go out of business. We're watching a replay of 2016. Media apologized after 2016 election, promised to cover Trump more “fairly” in order to get rid of him. California Trump rallygoer. Caller wants Trump to give away stimulus money by executive order.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

Rush JIPs the president’s Lititz, PA rally. Trump plays clips of Biden, Democrats and media at rally, just like Rush does on this show. Rush thanks everyone who's written and spoken about his battle with cancer. Rush resumes JIP of second Trump rally of the day. We have no choice in this election, we no longer share anything in common with the other side. Democrats don't want Biden to hold live events because they don't want anyone to know what they're for and they're afraid nobody will show up.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
